00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #ifdef _SOLARIS
00092 #include "solaris_port.h"
00093 #endif /* _SOLARIS */
00094 
00095 #include "LRU_List.h"
00096 #include "log_functions.h"
00097 #include "HashData.h"
00098 #include "HashTable.h"
00099 #include "fsal.h"
00100 #include "cache_inode.h"
00101 #include "cache_content.h"
00102 
00103 #include <unistd.h>
00104 #include <sys/types.h>
00105 #include <sys/param.h>
00106 #include <time.h>
00107 #include <pthread.h>
00108 
00109 
00110 cache_inode_status_t  cache_inode_add_data_cache( cache_entry_t           * pentry,
00111                                                   hash_table_t            * ht,
00112                                                   cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00113                                                   fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext, 
00114                                                   cache_inode_status_t    * pstatus)
00115 {
00116   cache_content_status_t   cache_content_status ;
00117   cache_content_entry_t  * pentry_content = NULL ;
00118   
00119   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00120   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00121   
00122   /* stats */
00123   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00124   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_ADD_DATA_CACHE] += 1 ;
00125   
00126   P_w( &pentry->lock ) ;
00127   /* Operate only on a regular file */
00128   if( pentry->internal_md.type != REGULAR_FILE )
00129     {
00130       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_BAD_TYPE ;
00131       V_w( &pentry->lock ) ;
00132       
00133       /* stats */
00134       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_ADD_DATA_CACHE] += 1 ;
00135       
00136       return *pstatus ;
00137     }
00138 
00139   if( pentry->object.file.pentry_content != NULL )
00140     {
00141       /* The object is already cached */
00142       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_CACHE_CONTENT_EXISTS ;
00143       V_w( &pentry->lock ) ;
00144       
00145       /* stats */
00146       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_ADD_DATA_CACHE] += 1 ;
00147       
00148       return *pstatus ;
00149     }
00150  
00151   if( ( pentry_content = cache_content_new_entry( pentry, 
00152                                                   NULL,
00153                                                   (cache_content_client_t *)pclient->pcontent_client, 
00154                                                   ADD_ENTRY, 
00155                                                   pcontext,
00156                                                   &cache_content_status ) ) == NULL )
00157     {
00158       *pstatus = cache_content_error_convert( cache_content_status ) ;
00159       V_w( &pentry->lock ) ;
00160       
00161       /* stats */
00162       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_ADD_DATA_CACHE] += 1 ;
00163       
00164       return *pstatus ;
00165     }
00166 
00167   /* Attached the entry to the cache inode */
00168   pentry->object.file.pentry_content = pentry_content ;
00169   
00170   V_w( &pentry->lock ) ;
00171   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00172 
00173   /* stats */
00174   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_ADD_DATA_CACHE] += 1 ;
00175   return *pstatus ;
00176 } /* cache_inode_add_data_cache */
